title: Finest Hour-VHS Rip (BBC 1999)
description:
Sue Johnston narrates this 1999 BBC documentary four-part series chronicling Britain's dark days in the Second World War. Alongside footage from Dunkirk, the Blitz and the Battle of Britain, those who were actually there - soldiers, sailors, pilots and civilians - provide personal testimony as to how Britain rose to the occasion.
